mapper.select: select a.* from (select ROWNUM as RNUM,b.* from (select * from qna order by board_num desc)b )a where a.RNUM>=#{start} and a.RNUM<=#{end}
select name from member where member_num=#{member_num}
select board_pass from qna where board_num=#{board_num}
select count(*) from qna_reply where board_num = #{board_num}
update qna set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where board_num=#{board_num}
select reply_num, board_num, reply_content, reply_writeday, a.member_num, b.name from qna_reply a, member b where a.board_num = #{board_num} and a.member_num=b.member_num
update qna set readcount = readcount+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
